ja482:5.3: Yo → ko (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed), migamakkhāti → ... makkhāsi (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja482:10.3: Soyaṃ → so hi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja482:14.3: Hanāmi taṃ mittadubbhiṃ akiccakāriṃ → hanāmi mittaddu'makiccakāriṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja482:21.2: raṭṭhañcāpi vinassatu → mā maṃ janapado ahu (sya1ed, sya2ed)
